Title: Chi La Sow
Writer: Rahul Ravindran (dialogue), Rahul Ravindran (screenplay), Rahul Ravindran (story)
Actors: Sushanth, Ruhani Sharma, Vennela Kishore, Anu Hassan
Plot: While Arjun doesn't want to get married, his parents set up a blind date for him at his place. The story revolves around Arjun, how he falls for the girl he's about to meet, why and how he changed his decision to get married.
